svg.title: Guangzhou Metro Map in London Style (2023)

g.text: Line 3 train from Panyu Square will continue its journey to Tianhe Coach Terminal through Line 10 from this station. Passengers for Airport N. should change train at this station. Line 3 train from Airport N. stops service at this station. Passengers for Panyu Square should change train at this station.
自番禺廣場開出的3號綫列車將駛經本站進入 10號綫，並以天河客運站為終點站。往機場北 的乘客請在此站轉車。 自機場北開出的3號綫列車將以本站為終點站。 往番禺廣場的乘客請在此站轉車。
